extends Path.Node

    • 方法详细资料

      • getContainerClass

        Class<?> getContainerClass()
        返回:
        the type of the container the node is placed in, if contained in a container type such as Optional, List or Map, null otherwise
        从以下版本开始:
        2.0

      • getTypeArgumentIndex

        Integer getTypeArgumentIndex()
        返回:
        the index of the type argument affected by the violated constraint, if contained in a generic container type such as Optional, List or Map, null otherwise
        从以下版本开始:
        2.0
